casebody.data:
Edwin B. CADWELL, Elwood C. Johnston, William D. Johnston, and Frank M. Ashley, Plalntiffs-Appellants, v. FIRESTONE TIRE & RUBBER CO., Defendant-Respondent. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 20, 1928. No. 7. Albert T. Seharps, of New York City (Morris Kirsehstein, of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. Albert L. Ely, of Akron, Ohio, and Charles Neave and Stephen EL Philbin, both of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (13 F.[2d] 483) affirmed.
